body.name: Techage 5MP PoE Camera Outdoor 24/7 Automatic Tracking IP66 PoE IP Camera 355° Pan & 50° Tilt, Color Night Vision, Human Detection, Customized Alert Area, 2-Way Audio, Blue&Red Floodlight Alarm
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 12 mins
features: 5 megapixel PoE surveillance & security cameras with 355° horizontal and 90° vertical, Built-in 6 white lights and 6 IR lights, The Pan Tilt PoE ip camera is ideal for wider view and high quality picture. Automatic Tracking and Cruise Control to safeguard your family, According to your needs, you can set 8 positions. The mobile phone can realize a four-split screen and watch the monitoring scenes of four matched devices at the same time. Multiple devices can be added to the APP

Motion detecting trigger with the red & blue alarms.Turn on Human Detection(Motion Tracking does not work simultaneously ) and choose the smart color night mode,white lights also turn on.Whatever day or night, it can clearly present the surveillance scene. 24/7 recording security cameras support capturing pictures of any unexpected moments to protect you and your family. Infrared night vision is also optional, with a nice viewing distance of 98ft

Monitoring area and alarm time customized settings are available ,the movement of objects in the monitoring area will trigger alarms. The sensitivity of motion detection can be adjusted in the APP, which reduces unnecessary alarm notifications. Setting the alarm time and you won’t be disturbed by the alarm pushing during your busy time .The cameras for home security outside have a built-in microphone and support two-way audio, so you can talk to visitors or deter unwanted people

IP66 waterproof and unlimited sharing. Built to weather harsh rain or snow, the PoE outdoor camera is working as usual, Tolerate temperature: -4℉-149℉. Support two ways of video storage, the micro SD card storage is up to 128GB(not included). You can also subscribe cloud service depending on your needs, We compensate you with one month cloud service for trying.Through the app, you can share your interesting video to your friends and families

More reaching ways, you have three options which including mobile phone app,web browser,PC software to play and record professionally after you have matched up your camaras de seguridad para casa in app and created your account, . The PoE camera is works on a more stable network environment(no wifi needed), data transmission is more powerful, which provides clearer images . Note that the product does not include power supply and PoE NVR,POE switch, you need to buy separately for normal use

Multi-Device Viewing iCSee App/Client works on Android/iOS/Windows/Mac for you to view and control the camera. Also support view on web browsers. No wifi needed, not include power supply and PoE NVR,PoE switch,need to buy separately for normal use Micro SD Card& Cloud Storage The poe camera outdoor supports both SD card up to 128GB and cloud storage.(Cloud storage is not forced,SD card is not included.) We're offering a free one-month trial of cloud service,no mandatory subscription
Previous page Next page 1 Auto Tracking 2 IP66 Waterproof 3 Customized Zone 4 Talk & Share

Does this camera need wifi to work? No, wifi is not available. Use ethernet via only one network cable (No Power Adapter Included) Can the PoE camera work without NVR? Yes, the PoE camera can also be used with a PoE switch or injector with a 48V-54V power supply; or use a DC 12V power adapter to power the camera (not included). You can set up and access the camera through iCSee App, VMS client or web browser Is the PoE camera compatible with third-party software/system/NVR? The PoE outdoor camera can be compatible with iCSee/XMEYE Pro third-party software; compatible with most PoE NVRs that support H.265/H.264

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to my security set up
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and love the fact that I don't need to worry about the power source since it screws into a light socket. Connects with no issues to my wifi, and very responsive. Being able to rotate the camera to view different angles is a plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent value, works with NVR
reviews.reviewText: I like that it works with my NVR
